Package org.jboss.resteasy.core.messagebody

Interface AsyncBufferedMessageBodyWriter<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncMessageBodyWriter<T>, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJAXBProvider, AtomEntryProvider, AtomFeedProvider, CollectionProvider, DocumentProvider, FastInfosetCollectionProvider, FastinfoSetElementProvider, FastInfosetMapProvider, FastinfoSetXmlRootElementProvider, FastinfoSetXmlSeeAlsoProvider, FastinfoSetXmlTypeProvider, JAXBElementProvider, JAXBXmlRootElementProvider, JAXBXmlSeeAlsoProvider, JAXBXmlTypeProvider, JsonArrayProvider, JsonObjectProvider, JsonStructureProvider, JsonValueProvider, MapProvider, MultipartSignedWriter, ResteasyJackson2Provider, SourceProvider, XopWithMultipartRelatedJAXBProvider

extends AsyncMessageBodyWriter<T>

      Write a type to an HTTP message using async IO.

      • Methods inherited from interface javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter

    • Method Detail

      • asyncWriteTo

        default CompletionStage<Void> asyncWriteTo​(T t,
                                           Class<?> type,
                                           Type genericType,
                                           Annotation[] annotations,
                                           javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                           javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,​Object> httpHeaders,
                                           AsyncOutputStream entityStream)
        Description copied from interface: AsyncMessageBodyWriter
        Write a type to an HTTP message using async IO. The message header map is mutable but any changes must be made before writing to the async output stream since the headers will be flushed prior to writing the message body.
        Specified by:
        asyncWriteTo in interface AsyncMessageBodyWriter<T>
        Parameters:
        t - the instance to write.
        type - the class of instance that is to be written.
        genericType - the type of instance to be written. GenericEntity provides a way to specify this information at runtime.
        annotations - an array of the annotations attached to the message entity instance.
        mediaType - the media type of the HTTP entity.
        httpHeaders - a mutable map of the HTTP message headers.
        entityStream - the AsyncOutputStream for the HTTP entity. The implementation should not close the output stream.
        Returns:
        a CompletionStage indicating completion
